Description.Text: Vashotel Vladykino is a friendly 3-star hotel offering basic accommodation in north Moscow. Highlights include a beauty salon, onsite dining, free parking and a good location close to a metro station. The All-Russia Exhibition Centre is a grand, permanent trade show located in the north of Moscow, neighbouring the Moscow Botanical Garden of Academy of Sciences. Nearby places of interest include the 18th-century Ostankino Palace and Cosmonauts Alley, home to the Memorial Museum of Astronautics and the Monument to the Conquerors of Space. Vladykino metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Moscow destinations. The hotel occupies a late 20th-century high-rise building with a grey facade. Facilities include a beauty salon. Economy Plus rooms are bright and simply decorated in a traditional style with dark wood furniture. Amenities include a fridge and flat-screen TV. Bathroom facilities are shared between two rooms. The hotel cafe offers a range of drinks and light meals. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
